description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pass The Pad! is an exciting word game with explosive consequences. Can you think of a word and pass the pad before the time runs out? Featuring over 260,000 different game combinations, Pass The Pad! has guaranteed replay ability and appeals to people of all ages. Great fun for parties of 2+ players.
